table.name: vtiger_cbsurveyanswer
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbsurveyanswer` ( `cbsurveyanswerid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cbsurveyanswer_no` varchar(26) default NULL, `relatedwith` int(11) default NULL, `cbsurvey` int(11) default NULL, `cbsurveydone` int(11) default NULL, `cbsurveyq` int(11) default NULL, `cbsa_providerid` varchar(126) default NULL, `positive` varchar(3) default NULL, `evaluate` decimal(2,2) default NULL, `cbsurveyanswer` text, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsurveyanswerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbsurveyanswercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbsurveyanswercf` ( `cbsurveyanswerid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsurveyanswerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
